programme.title: Creepshow
programme.desc: Anthology of five scary tales paying homage to the cult American EC comics of the 1950s and based on stories by Stephen King, who also makes a cameo appearance. Horror, starring Leslie Nielsen, Carrie Nye and Hal Holbrook.(n)

programme.title: Armageddon
programme.desc: Nasa discovers an asteroid the size of Texas is on a collision course with Earth, so a drilling expert is recruited to train a team of misfits to transport a nuclear device into outer space to destroy it - but having had no experience of space travel, the reluctant astronauts find themselves seriously out of their depth. Sci-fi thriller, with Bruce Willis, Ben Affleck, Liv Tyler, Michael Clarke Duncan, Billy Bob Thornton and Steve Buscemi.(n)

programme.title: Close Encounters of the Third Kind
programme.desc: An electrical repairman sees a fleet of UFOs and develops an increasing fascination with mountain-shaped forms, driving his wife to despair. Meanwhile, another woman has a similar fixation after her son mysteriously vanishes, and a team of scientists investigates a series of strange events around the world. Eventually, they are all drawn to a mountain where aliens are about to make contact. Steven Spielberg's sci-fi drama, starring Richard Dreyfuss, Francois Truffaut and Teri Garr.(n)

programme.title: Ex Machina
programme.desc: A computer programmer working for the world's biggest search engine is given the opportunity to spend a week at the remote home of his boss, a hi-tech genius. The break turns out to be an elaborate experiment, in which he must test the world's first truly artificial intelligence, which is housed in the body of a beautiful robot girl. Sci-fi drama, starring Domhnall Gleeson, Alicia Vikander and Oscar Isaac.(n)

programme.title: Star Trek Beyond: Special
programme.desc: The making of the latest instalment in the sci-fi series, starring Chris Pine, Zachary Quinto and Zoe Saldana.(n)

programme.title: Maggie
programme.desc: A virus sweeps across America turning people into zombies, and the government establishes measures to capture those infected and dispose of them once the process is complete. When a teenage girl is infected, her devoted father refuses to hand her over to the authorities, and vows to defend her to the bitter end. Horror, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger and Abigail Breslin.(n)

programme.title: The Visit
programme.desc: Two children are sent by their parents to spend a week at their grandparents' remote farm. They are confused by the old couple's strange house rules, but as they investigate, they discover something disturbing is going on - and that they may not be returning home alive. Horror, starring Olivia DeJonge and Ed Oxenbould.(n)

programme.title: Batman Begins
programme.desc: Billionaire Bruce Wayne travels the world seeking the means to fight injustice, consumed with rage over his parents' murder. Trained by a secret society, he hones his fighting skills and returns to his home city of Gotham on a mission to rid it of crime and corruption in the guise of a masked vigilante. Comic-book adventure, exploring the origins of the Dark Knight, with Christian Bale, Michael Caine, Liam Neeson, Cillian Murphy, Gary Oldman and Katie Holmes.(n)

programme.title: The Top Ten Show 2016
programme.desc: Countdown of the biggest box office hits in Britain and America.(n)

programme.title: Ex Machina
programme.desc: A computer programmer working for the world's biggest search engine is given the opportunity to spend a week at the remote home of his boss, a hi-tech genius. The break turns out to be an elaborate experiment, in which he must test the world's first truly artificial intelligence, which is housed in the body of a beautiful robot girl. Sci-fi drama, starring Domhnall Gleeson, Alicia Vikander and Oscar Isaac.(n)

Trained by a secret society, he hones his fighting skills and returns to his home city of Gotham on a mission to rid it of crime and corruption in the guise of a masked vigilante. Comic-book adventure, exploring the origins of the Dark Knight, with Christian Bale, Michael Caine, Liam Neeson, Cillian Murphy, Gary Oldman and Katie Holmes.(n)

programme.title: A Clockwork Orange
programme.desc: Sadistic young gang leader Alex leads a carefree life indulging his love of rape, violence and classical music. When he is finally arrested, he is subjected to a sinister form of aversion therapy that brainwashes him into being physically unable to use violence. However, on his release, he finds friends and family have turned on him, while others seek to exploit him to further their political ends. Drama, starring Malcolm McDowell and Warren Clarke.

programme.title: The Devils
programme.desc: A sexually liberated priest in 17th-century France attracts the hatred of the King and the church with his radical views. When an obsessed nun accuses him of witchcraft, the cleric's enemies strike, using increasingly brutal tactics in their efforts to prove him a heretic. Ken Russell's historical drama, starring Oliver Reed and Vanessa Redgrave.

programme.title: East of Eden
programme.desc: The son of a farmer struggles to cope with his father disregarding him in favour of his brother, as well as the revelation that his supposedly dead mother is alive and running a brothel. America's coming involvement in the First World War gives him an idea for a business venture that he hopes will earn the old man's respect. Drama based on John Steinbeck's novel, starring James Dean and Raymond Massey.

programme.title: National Lampoon's Animal House
programme.desc: A college's most slobbish and unruly student fraternity faces expulsion for upsetting the rigid social order of the campus, so its madcap members plan one final act of rebellion against the college dean and a preppy bunch of snobbish bullies at the annual university homecoming parade. Comedy, starring John Belushi, Tim Matheson, Donald Sutherland, Karen Allen and Tom Hulce.

programme.title: Love & Mercy
programme.desc: Biopic of the Beach Boys' Brian Wilson, following the singer-songwriter at two periods in his life. In the 1960s, he is at his creative peak, but haunted by inner demons that take their toll on his mental health. By the 1980s, he is a broken man dominated by a shady doctor, until a new relationship offers him a chance at recovery. Starring John Cusack, Paul Dano, Paul Giamatti and Elizabeth Banks.

programme.title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
programme.desc: A laconic gunslinger, a ruthless hired killer and a conniving outlaw hunt for a cache of loot during the chaos of the American Civil War. However, each is privy to only part of the information necessary to find it, setting in motion a series of deadly betrayals. The third film in Sergio Leone's Spaghetti Western trilogy, starring Clint Eastwood as the Man with No Name, with Lee Van Cleef and Eli Wallach. With a soundtrack by Ennio Morricone.

programme.title: Champion
programme.desc: A war veteran criss-crosses America with his disabled brother in tow as he builds a new career as a renowned prizefighter. However, his ruthless determination to make it to the top drives him to betray the people closest to him. Drama, starring Kirk Douglas, Marilyn Maxwell, Arthur Kennedy, Paul Stewart and Ruth Roman.

programme.title: Broadcast News
programme.desc: The highly strung producer of a Washington news bureau falls for a handsome but arrogant and totally untalented new anchorman, but is unaware a humble reporter friend is deeply infatuated with her. Comedy, starring Holly Hunter, William Hurt and Albert Brooks. Featuring an uncredited cameo from Jack Nicholson.

programme.title: The Drop
programme.desc: A Brooklyn bartender secretly provides a service delivering shipments of money to local gangsters. His criminal connections lead to his involvement in a robbery that goes disastrously wrong and digs up the long-buried secrets from his neighbourhood's past. Crime drama based on a short story by Dennis Lehane, starring Tom Hardy, Noomi Rapace and James Gandolfini in his final film role.

programme.title: Love & Mercy
programme.desc: Biopic of the Beach Boys' Brian Wilson, following the singer-songwriter at two periods in his life. In the 1960s, he is at his creative peak, but haunted by inner demons that take their toll on his mental health. By the 1980s, he is a broken man dominated by a shady doctor, until a new relationship offers him a chance at recovery. Starring John Cusack, Paul Dano, Paul Giamatti and Elizabeth Banks.

programme.title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
programme.desc: A laconic gunslinger, a ruthless hired killer and a conniving outlaw hunt for a cache of loot during the chaos of the American Civil War. However, each is privy to only part of the information necessary to find it, setting in motion a series of deadly betrayals. The third film in Sergio Leone's Spaghetti Western trilogy, starring Clint Eastwood as the Man with No Name, with Lee Van Cleef and Eli Wallach. With a soundtrack by Ennio Morricone.

programme.title: Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas
programme.desc: A reckless sports writer and his lawyer hit the highways in search of the American Dream, heading for the Nevada gambling capital in a convertible stocked with alcohol and drugs. Comedy, adapted by Terry Gilliam from Hunter S Thompson's book, starring Johnny Depp, Benicio Del Toro, Ellen Barkin, Christina Ricci and Tobey Maguire.(n)

programme.title: A Dirty Shame
programme.desc: A bump on the head transforms a sexually repressed housewife into a sex-addicted exhibitionist - who, finding her husband can no longer fulfil her needs, goes in search of satisfaction in Baltimore's seedy underworld. John Waters' comedy, starring Tracey Ullman, Johnny Knoxville, Selma Blair and Chris Isaak.(n)

programme.title: Champion
programme.desc: A war veteran criss-crosses America with his disabled brother in tow as he builds a new career as a renowned prizefighter. However, his ruthless determination to make it to the top drives him to betray the people closest to him. Drama, starring Kirk Douglas, Marilyn Maxwell, Arthur Kennedy, Paul Stewart and Ruth Roman.(n)

programme.title: The Truman Show
programme.desc: A man is unaware his uneventful life is really a sham, and his every move is being secretly filmed and broadcast to the world as part of a 24-hour TV soap. However, a series of unforeseen events leads him to question the nature of his existence. Peter Weir's media satire, starring Jim Carrey, Natascha McElhone, Laura Linney, Noah Emmerich and Ed Harris.(n)

programme.title: Vanilla Sky
programme.desc: The laid-back lifestyle of an arrogant New York playboy is shattered when his unstable girlfriend drives off a bridge with him in the car. Although he survives, he struggles to put his life back together in the face of a series of strange events. Cameron Crowe's remake of Spanish thriller Open Your Eyes, starring Tom Cruise, Cameron Diaz, Kurt Russell, Jason Lee and Penelope Cruz, who also appeared in the original.(n)

programme.title: Partisan
programme.desc: A young boy raised to be an assassin starts to question the ways of his community's charismatic and domineering leader. Drama, with Vincent Cassel, Jeremy Chabriel and Florence Mezzara.(n)

programme.title: The Hustler
programme.desc: An arrogant pool shark challenges a renowned champion player, only to lose the match and end up broke with his confidence shattered. With the aid of a cut-throat manager, he sets about honing his skills for a rematch - but making it to the top could cost him everything. Oscar-winning drama, starring Paul Newman, Jackie Gleason, George C Scott, Piper Laurie, Murray Hamilton and Myron McCormick.(n)

programme.title: Cool Hand Luke
programme.desc: A rebellious small-time crook is sent to a prison in the Deep South, where he becomes a hero in the eyes of his fellow convicts and a thorn in the sides of the warden and the guards by refusing to bow to authority. His defiance escalates when he receives news of his mother's death, and embarks on a series of failed escape attempts. Drama based on Donn Pearce's novel, starring Paul Newman, George Kennedy, JD Cannon and Dennis Hopper.(n)

programme.title: Irrational Man
programme.desc: A troubled philosophy professor begins teaching at a small town college, but struggles to find any meaning in his life. He finds some measure of happiness in his friendship with a student, and when they overhear a stranger's conversation, it spurs the tortured academic on to a course of action that changes everything. Woody Allen's drama, starring Joaquin Phoenix, Emma Stone and Parker Posey.(n)

programme.title: The Truman Show
programme.desc: A man is unaware his uneventful life is really a sham, and his every move is being secretly filmed and broadcast to the world as part of a 24-hour TV soap. However, a series of unforeseen events leads him to question the nature of his existence. Peter Weir's media satire, starring Jim Carrey, Natascha McElhone, Laura Linney, Noah Emmerich and Ed Harris.(n)

programme.title: Vanilla Sky
programme.desc: The laid-back lifestyle of an arrogant New York playboy is shattered when his unstable girlfriend drives off a bridge with him in the car. Although he survives, he struggles to put his life back together in the face of a series of strange events. Cameron Crowe's remake of Spanish thriller Open Your Eyes, starring Tom Cruise, Cameron Diaz, Kurt Russell, Jason Lee and Penelope Cruz, who also appeared in the original.(n)

programme.title: Wall Street
programme.desc: An inexperienced financial trader is taken under the wing of a corrupt New York corporate raider, who draws him into the shady world of illegal insider dealing with promises of money and power. But the trainee stockbroker questions the morality of his actions when the consequences of a deal strike close to home. Oliver Stone's Oscar-winning drama, starring Michael Douglas, father and son Martin and Charlie Sheen, Daryl Hannah and Terence Stamp.(n)

programme.title: The Fighter
programme.desc: Fact-based drama about boxer Micky Ward. He is initially trained by his brother, a former fighter who lost everything through drug addiction. Micky is persuaded to sever ties with his family after a series of disastrous fights, but when a shot at the world championship title presents itself, the brothers must reconcile to meet the challenge. With Mark Wahlberg, Amy Adams and Oscar-winning performances from Christian Bale and Melissa Leo.

programme.title: Napoleon Dynamite
programme.desc: A socially inept high-school student and his lonely unemployed brother find their eccentric home life thrown into upheaval when their meddling uncle comes to stay. The teenage oddball tries to make the best of his changing circumstances, while putting all his skills to the task of helping his new best friend win the class presidency. Comedy, starring Jon Heder, Efren Ramirez and Haylie Duff.

programme.title: Captain Ron
programme.desc: An American businessman learns that his recently deceased uncle has left him a yacht moored in the Caribbean, and ill-advisedly puts his trust in a wayward one-eyed mariner to help him and his family sail the vessel back to Miami. Comedy adventure, starring Kurt Russell, Martin Short, Mary Kay Place and Benjamin Salisbury.

programme.title: The Great St Trinian's Train Robbery
programme.desc: A crook and his cronies stash the money from a train heist in a deserted old mansion, planning to recover it in good time. However, several years later, when the thieves arrive to collect their loot, they discover the building has been turned into a school for girls where the pupils have become infamous for their escapades. Comedy, starring Frankie Howerd, Dora Bryan, Reg Varney and George Cole.

programme.title: Coraline
programme.desc: A bored youngster finds a secret door leading to a magical world inhabited by idealised versions of her family and neighbours. Frustrated with her dull real life, she is tempted to stay in this new home - but she soon discovers there is a horrifying price to be paid. Stop-motion animated fantasy based on Neil Gaiman's novel, with the voices of Dakota Fanning and Teri Hatcher.

programme.title: Sister Act
programme.desc: Nightclub singer Deloris Van Cartier agrees to testify against her gangster boyfriend after witnessing a murder. Placed in protective custody by the authorities, she is less than pleased to discover she is expected to pose as chaste nun Sister Mary Clarence in a convent. Comedy, starring Whoopi Goldberg, Harvey Keitel, Maggie Smith, Bill Nunn and Kathy Najimy.

programme.title: Escape Plan
programme.desc: An expert takes a contract from the CIA to test a maximum security prison by trying to break out of it , but he soon discovers he has been duped and that his captors intend him to stay inside forever. He hatches a plan to escape, but to succeed he will need the help of a long-term convict - who wants his own freedom in return for assistance. Thriller, with Sylvester Stallone and Arnold Schwarzenegger.

programme.title: Commando
programme.desc: The daughter of retired special forces officer John Matrix is kidnapped by an old comrade-in-arms, now in league with a deposed former dictator. The tyrant plans to use the girl to force Matrix into assassinating the head of the country he once ruled, but is unprepared for the lengths to which the veteran soldier will go to rescue his child. Action adventure, with Arnold Schwarzenegger and Rae Dawn Chong.

programme.title: Alien 3
programme.desc: Ripley is marooned alone on an all-male prison planet, only to face another of the lethal extraterrestrial creatures - which begins to prey on the inmates. While trying to help them survive, she discovers a terrifying connection between herself and the monster. David Fincher's sci-fi thriller sequel, with Sigourney Weaver and Charles Dance.(n)

programme.title: The Dark Crystal
programme.desc: A survivor of a near-extinct race is given a dangerous quest as his world approaches an astronomical event that will decide its future. He must find a way to restore a broken piece to a magical crystal, which has become a source of dark power for the cruel creatures who wiped out his people. Jim Henson's puppet fantasy, with the voices of Stephen Garlick and Billie Whitelaw.(n)

programme.title: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Voyage of the Dawn Treader
programme.desc: Lucy and Edmund Pevensie return to the magical world accompanied by their selfish cousin. They join their old friend King Caspian as he sets sail across the sea in search of seven of his father's allies who had been banished years before, but along the way they discover an evil force is growing in strength. Fantasy adventure, with Georgie Henley, Skandar Keynes, Will Poulter and Ben Barnes.(n)

programme.title: Stuart Little
programme.desc: An American couple decide their son needs a brother, and plan to adopt another child - but when they get to the orphanage they are greeted by a charming talking mouse named Stuart, who fits the bill perfectly. However, their jealous cat hatches a plot to get rid of the new arrival. Comedy adventure, starring Geena Davis and Hugh Laurie, with the voice of Michael J Fox.(n)

programme.title: Cheaper By the Dozen
programme.desc: A large family moves to a new town, hoping for a fresh start - but nothing goes according to plan, and the unlucky dad ends up in charge of his 12 rowdy children while his wife goes on a promotional book tour. Remake of the 1950 comedy, starring Steve Martin, Bonnie Hunt, Piper Perabo, Tom Welling and Hilary Duff.(n)

programme.title: Mission: Impossible
programme.desc: Secret agents suspect there is a traitor in their organisation when their latest assignment ends in disaster. The sole survivor is accused of being the mole, forcing him to go on the run to clear his name. However, in the process, he discovers a former Russian spy is selling information about the world's leading undercover operatives. Action thriller based on the 1960s TV series, starring Tom Cruise, Jon Voight and Ving Rhames.(n)

programme.title: The Transporter
programme.desc: An underworld courier lives by a simple code - to never ask what he is transporting. However, when he discovers his latest cargo is alive, his conscience gets the better of him and he faces a dangerous game of cat and mouse with his unknown but powerful employers. Action adventure, starring Jason Statham, Shu Qi, Matt Schulze and Francois Berleand.(n)

programme.title: Die Hard
programme.desc: New York cop John McClane visits Los Angeles to see his family over the Christmas holiday. Stopping off at his wife's place of work, he realises armed men have taken over the building and are holding the corporation's staff to ransom - and only he has the ability to fight back. Action thriller, starring Bruce Willis, Alan Rickman and Bonnie Bedelia.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Ben enters a photo of Erin in a contest, but does not realise what they intend to do with it. Curt's death makes Mary Ellen become over-protective of her son.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Elizabeth has to look after the store after Ike has a heart attack, while Ben and Jim Bob go into the molasses business.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.sub-title: At the End of the Rainbow.
programme.desc: Laura and her friend Jonah find pyrite while fishing in a stream, and mistake it for gold. Laura spends her days amassing the `gold dust', and begins fantasising about her family being wealthy and the Olesons being poor. However the secrecy leads to squabbling.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: The children have a collection to buy a birthday present for the Rev Alden, but Laura's plan to raise even more money goes badly wrong.

programme.title: The Christmas Choir
programme.desc: A workaholic accountant is forced to reassess his priorities after his devotion to his job costs him his girlfriend. An encounter with a homeless pianist reminds him of his forgotten dream of becoming a musician, so he decides to help the residents of a homeless shelter earn some money by forming a choir. Drama, starring Jason Gedrick and Tyrone Benskin.

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Heartbeat
programme.desc: A pregnant TV producer, abandoned by her husband, falls for an equally lonely divorced colleague, but their romance is threatened by her inability to let go of the past. Drama, starring John Ritter, Polly Draper, Nancy Morgan and Kevin Kilner.

programme.title: Undercover Christmas
programme.desc: An FBI agent reluctantly agrees to keep a close eye on a waitress who put herself in the firing line when she spoke up about her boyfriend's criminal activities. However, the witness protection job takes a turn for the unexpected when the lawman has to return to his hometown for Christmas - dragging the damsel in distress with him. Romantic comedy, starring Jami Gertz, Shawn Christian and Tyne Daly.

programme.title: Hostile Advances: The Kerry Ellison Story
programme.desc: Fact-based drama about a woman who is forced to take on the entire justice system to rid herself of an unbalanced workmate's unwanted attentions - and finds she needs all her reserves of strength to see the case through. Starring Rena Sofer, Victor Garber, Maria Ricossa and Karen Allen.

programme.title: Miracle of the Heart
programme.desc: After losing a patient in surgery, doctor Nathan Andrews takes a break from his career and returns to his small town roots. A chance encounter with an old acquaintance offers him a promise for the future, only for a tragedy to call into question everything he believes. Drama, starring Neil Patrick Harris, Rebecca Gayheart and Rob Lowe.

programme.title: Christmas Every Day
programme.desc: Glum teenager Billy Jackson refuses to get into the yuletide spirit, and lashes out at his exuberant younger sister, Sarah, telling her there is no Father Christmas. In response, young Sarah wishes it could be Christmas every day, and when her request comes true, sullen Billy is forced to relive the holiday over and over again until he is able to appreciate its significance. Festive fantasy, starring Erik von Detten, Bess Armstrong, Yvonne Zima and Robert Hays.

programme.title: On the Second Day of Christmas
programme.desc: A woman and her niece are caught stealing just before Christmas, and face the prospect of spending the festive season in the care of social services - until a kindly shop worker volunteers to put them up. Romantic drama, starring Mary Stuart Masterson and Mark Ruffalo.

programme.title: Jack Reed: One of Our Own
programme.desc: The maverick detective's partner is murdered by a hitman they were investigating and he sets out to bring him to justice with the help of the killer's girlfriend. Thriller, directed by and starring Brian Dennehy. With Susan Ruttan, Charles Dutton and CCH Pounder.

programme.title: Murder of Innocence
programme.desc: A woman's descent into insanity is witnessed by her confused and alienated husband as he battles the authorities to prove she is a danger to society. Drama, starring Valerie Bertinelli and Stephen Caffrey.

programme.title: While Justice Sleeps
programme.desc: A widow is initially delighted by an old family friend's interest in her eight-year-old daughter, but soon starts to suspect the child is being abused. Drama, starring Cybill Shepherd, Tim Matheson, Karis Bryant and Dion Anderson.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Emily thinks her lost love has come back to her, only to discover it is his son, who is more interested in Erin. Guest starring Jonathan Frakes (Star Trek: The Next Generation).(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Ben surprises his family when he returns home with a new wife, but soon finds married life is harder than expected.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Mr Edwards finds that John prefers reading to hunting, and hopes to modify his adopted son's sensitive behaviour by buying him a rifle. Victor French stars.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Laura is attracted to a new boy in school, but Nellie is equally keen on him, and plans to ruin their romance.(n)

programme.title: View of Terror
programme.desc: A restaurateur's contented life is thrown into upheaval when she acquires the unwanted attention of an obsessive stalker, who torments her with menacing phone calls. With no clue as to the culprit's identity, she sinks into paranoia, becoming suspicious of everyone she knows. Thriller, starring Shannen Doherty and Michael Francouer.(n)

programme.title: Romance on the Orient Express
programme.desc: An American travelling by train from Venice to Paris bumps into her former lover, and the pair try to understand why their initial romance ended so abruptly. Romantic drama, starring Cheryl Ladd and Stuart Wilson.(n)

programme.title: Complex of Fear
programme.desc: A rookie cop is assigned the tough case of tracking down a killer wreaking havoc among the residents of a housing development - and all the clues point to one of his friends. Thriller, starring Joe Don Baker, Hart Bochner and Chelsea Field.(n)

programme.title: DC 9/11: Time of Crisis
programme.desc: Fact-based drama chronicling the aftermath of the September 11 attacks, as people across America attempted to come to terms with the tragedy, focusing on the reaction of President George W Bush and the advice given by his many advisors. Timothy Bottoms, John Cunningham, Andrew Gillies, Penny Johnson and Doug Lennox star.(n)

programme.title: Great Escape 2: The Untold Story
programme.desc: Part one of two. A daring army major returns to Germany to capture the Gestapo officer who ordered the massacre of 50 of his men. Second World War drama, starring Christopher Reeve.(n)

programme.title: Great Escape 2: The Untold Story
programme.desc: Part two of two. A daring army major returns to Germany to capture the Gestapo officer who ordered the massacre of 50 of his men. Second World War drama, starring Christopher Reeve.(n)

programme.title: Remembrance of Love
programme.desc: A widowed concentration camp survivor searches for the woman he loved and lost as a teenager during the Holocaust. Romantic drama, with Pam Dawber and Chana Eden.(n)

programme.title: A Silent Night
programme.desc: A mother and her son are caught in the middle of a Second World War battle and seek shelter in a cabin on Christmas Eve. During the night they are disturbed by three American soldiers and three Germans but she is determined they should keep the peace and enjoy a meal on the holy night. Drama, starring Linda Hamilton, Matthew Harbour and Alan Goulem.(n)

programme.title: One Against the Wind
programme.desc: Biopic of Second World War heroine Mary Lindell, who helped freedom fighters and members of the Allied forces escape the clutches of the Nazis in occupied France. Starring Judy Davis, Sam Neill, Denholm Elliot and Kate Beckinsale.(n)

programme.title: Murder of Innocence
programme.desc: A woman's descent into insanity is witnessed by her confused and alienated husband as he battles the authorities to prove she is a danger to society. Drama, starring Valerie Bertinelli and Stephen Caffrey.(n)

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.sub-title: One Fresh Batch of Lemonade - Part Two.
programme.desc: Part two of two. Jonathan enlists the aid of a gymnast in restoring Deke's faith in himself, and also tries to reconcile the former athlete with his father.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Jonathan helps a man who thinks he is King Arthur to make peace with the son who wants to have him committed, while also trying to save a veterinary clinic. Ron Moody guest stars.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Matt tries to persuade an old friend who has turned to drink to mend his ways.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Dodge City is rocked by a series of apparently random murders, and Matt fears that Doc may be the next target.

programme.title: Touched by an Angel
programme.desc: The godly helpers assist two women who are in love with the same man. Roma Downey and Della Reese star.

programme.title: Touched by an Angel
programme.desc: A stuffy doctor finds a homeless child on his doorstep claiming to be from Child Watch - but Monica learns the truth and urges him to come clean. Roma Downey and Della Reese star.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: The Walton clan takes an eight-year-old orphan into the home for a taste of family life.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: An eerie atmosphere descends over the household as Olivia recalls the strange events that followed the death of a childhood friend.

programme.title: Runaway Car
programme.desc: The accelerator on a woman's car jams, leaving its passengers facing a terrifying ordeal as they attempt to find a way of bringing the vehicle to a stop. Action thriller, with Judge Reinhold, Nina Siemaszko, Brian Hooks and Leon.

programme.title: In the Line of Duty: The Price of Vengeance
programme.desc: A tough-talking hitman sets out to bump off a quartet of local businessman who stand in his way - but he decides to do away with a hard-nosed cop into the bargain, a decision that makes him the target of a furious vendetta. Crime thriller, starring Dean Stockwell, Michael Gross and Brent Jennings.

programme.title: Undercover Christmas
programme.desc: An FBI agent reluctantly agrees to keep a close eye on a waitress who put herself in the firing line when she spoke up about her boyfriend's criminal activities. However, the witness protection job takes a turn for the unexpected when the lawman has to return to his hometown for Christmas - dragging the damsel in distress with him. Romantic comedy, starring Jami Gertz, Shawn Christian and Tyne Daly.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Jason tries to reform Cousin Boone after he gets in trouble with the law again, and John-Boy's ex-fiancee visits Walton's Mountain.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Laura wins a writing competition and travels to Minneapolis to meet a publisher who encourages her to pen her first book. However, the editor has other ideas for her work.

programme.title: Wife, Mother, Murderer
programme.desc: A woman desperate to escape her small town roots murders her husband, attempts to poison her child and assumes multiple fake identities, even going so far as to fake the death of one of her aliases and take on the guise of her own identical twin sister. Fact-based drama, starring Judith Light and David Ogden Stiers.

programme.title: Lethal Seduction
programme.desc: A reporter poses as an illegal immigrant and takes a job in the office of a ruthless, seductive lawyer, hoping to expose her corrupt business practices. However, his pursuit of a story is threatened when he becomes infatuated with her. Comedy drama, starring Melanie Griffith and Esai Morales.

programme.title: Princess Diana: A Day in the Life
programme.desc: Documentary examining Lady Diana Spencer's sometimes awkward transition into royalty and the princess's day to day life in the public eye.

programme.title: Prince William & Prince Harry: Prisoners of Celebrity
programme.desc: Documentary exploring how the royals cope with being part of modern celebrity culture.

programme.title: Bloody Sunday
programme.desc: Fact-based drama telling the story of the events of January 30, 1972, when soldiers attached to the Parachute Regiment opened fire on a civil rights march taking place in Londonderry, killing 13 unarmed civilians. Directed by Paul Greengrass and starring James Nesbitt, Nicholas Farrell, Tim Pigott-Smith and Kathy Keira Clarke.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark are hired to look after the children of a movie star who has little time for his family.(n)

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark come to the aid of a scriptwriter, who needs help funding a movie.(n)

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Matt learns that a fellow lawman has been corrupted by power, and rules over his town with an iron fist. Nick Nolte guest stars.(n)

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: An elderly judge is sent to oversee the trial of a gang of outlaws, and takes desperate steps to ensure that justice is done.(n)

programme.title: Touched by an Angel
programme.desc: Monica and Tess try to help a sheriff come to terms with his own past while trying to help his son from committing suicide. Roma Downey and Della Reese star.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy returns his new high-school graduation suit so the family can afford to buy a new cow when Chance dies. Richard Thomas and Ralph Waite star.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: A travelling salesman convinces the family to part with their hard-earned cash and buy a small library's worth of novels, essays and poems. But when the books fail to arrive, they soon begin to wonder if he is really a conman.(n)

programme.title: The Haunting of Sarah Hardy
programme.desc: A woman is troubled by witnessing her mother's suicide as a child. As her wedding approaches, she is tormented by strange manifestations and becomes convinced her mother's spirit is haunting her. However, she does not realise someone is plotting to drive her insane. Thriller, starring Sela Ward and Michael Woods.(n)

programme.title: Great Escape 2: The Untold Story
programme.desc: Part one of two. A daring army major returns to Germany to capture the Gestapo officer who ordered the massacre of 50 of his men. Second World War drama, starring Christopher Reeve.(n)

programme.title: No One Could Protect Her
programme.desc: A woman is raped in her own home, but the police seem powerless to apprehend the attacker. As reports of further sexual assaults in her neighbourhood mount up, all seemingly the work of the same man, she resolves to turn detective and bring him to justice herself. Thriller based on a true story, starring Joanna Kerns, Anthony John Denison and Peter MacNeill.(n)

programme.title: Video Voyeur: The Susan Wilson Story
programme.desc: A woman is understandably horrified to discover her apparently kind-hearted neighbour has somehow managed to install state-of-the-art surveillance equipment throughout her home, so he can spy on her and her family. Fact-based drama, starring Angie Harmon, Jamey Sheridan and Dale Midkiff.(n)

programme.title: Family Rescue
programme.desc: A teenager is raped and becomes pregnant by her mother's boyfriend - but to her horror, the court grants him custody of the child. Drama, starring George C Scott, Rachael Leigh Cook, Dom Diamont and Ally Sheedy.(n)

programme.title: The Disappearing Act
programme.desc: A distraught mother turns detective to find out the truth behind her son's disappearance, concerned he may have met with foul play at the hands of his beautiful but volatile girlfriend. Fact-based drama, starring Patty Duke, Kelly Rowan and Robert Floyd.(n)

programme.title: Field Punishment No 1
programme.desc: The New Zealand army forcibly transports 14 conscientious objectors to the European front lines during the First World War. The men struggle to cling to their principles through brutal treatment in a series of military prisons, mental hospitals and battlefields. Fact-based drama, starring Fraser Brown and Byron Coll.(n)

programme.title: Soldier's Girl
programme.desc: A group of soldiers attend a drag show, and one of them ends up forming a relationship with a transsexual performer. One of his friends turns against him and begins stirring up hostility among the ranks. Their drill sergeant resolves to drive out the rumoured gay recruit, but some of the men take a more violent approach. Fact-based drama, starring Troy Garity and Lee Pace.(n)

programme.title: Roadies
programme.desc: Longest Days. Janine shakes things up with the band and crew; Wes treats Winston to a guitar lesson from a rock legend

programme.title: Ray Donovan
programme.desc: Fish and Bird. Ray waits to see if Belikov will be released from prison and struggles with the prospect of putting a pimp back out on the street. Later, Art dealer Sonia Kovitsky invites Ray to a breast cancer benefit where he encounters some former clients and becomes more entrenched in her operation. Meanwhile, Teresa spirals into a postpartum depression; and Mickey tries to persuade the DA that he was the sole architect behind the Minassian massacre

programme.title: Sleeping With Other People
programme.desc: After losing their virginity together in college, Lainey and Jake meet again years later at a support group for sex addicts. They vow to remain platonic friends, but the depth of their relationship makes them reconsider their bed-hopping lifestyle

programme.title: Machine Gun Preacher
programme.desc: A life-changing journey to East Africa causes a former gang member (Gerard Butler) to dedicate his life to rescuing children who were captured and trained as soldiers by the Lord's Resistance Army in this inspirational drama based on actual events

programme.title: Frank & Jesse
programme.desc: Frank and Jesse James were outlaw brothers who sought their own brand of justice. They gained fame for their daring hold-ups of banks, trains, and stagecoaches -- and make sworn enemies of lawmen, who are determined to see them dead

programme.title: Bernie
programme.desc: After striking up a friendship with a wealthy widow, small-town mortician Bernie goes to desperate measures when he becomes fed up with her incessant nagging. Black comedy

programme.title: Begin Again
programme.desc: An ambitious young female singer moves to New York City in search of stardom, but finds only disappointment until falling for a struggling record producer who helps her down the road to fame

programme.title: Beautiful Girls
programme.desc: An all-star cast sparks this captivating comedy about a group of old friends whose 10-year high school reunion creates some hilariously unexpected surprises

programme.title: Miami Vice
programme.desc: Miami detectives Crockett and Tubbs go undercover to break up a Colombian drug cartel in this slick update of the trendy 1980s cop series

programme.title: Killing Season
programme.desc: An ex-soldier tracks down a fellow veteran of the Bosnian War in search of revenge, leading to a showdown in the Appalachian Mountains

programme.title: The Imitation Game
programme.desc: Mathematician Alan Turing attempts to crack the Enigma code during World War II

programme.title: Black Hawk Down
programme.desc: Gritty war drama co-starring our very own Ewan McGregor based on a botched mission during America's military involvement in Somalia during the early 1990s. An attempt by US Army Rangers parachuted into Mogadishu to capture a warlord's two top lieutenants goes disastrously wrong when two helicopters are shot down. 'Hulk' star Eric Bana also shines here. Dir: Ridley Scott

programme.title: Roadies
programme.desc: Longest Days. Janine shakes things up with the band and crew; Wes treats Winston to a guitar lesson from a rock legend

programme.title: Ray Donovan
programme.desc: Fish and Bird. Ray waits to see if Belikov will be released from prison and struggles with the prospect of putting a pimp back out on the street. Later, Art dealer Sonia Kovitsky invites Ray to a breast cancer benefit where he encounters some former clients and becomes more entrenched in her operation. Meanwhile, Teresa spirals into a postpartum depression; and Mickey tries to persuade the DA that he was the sole architect behind the Minassian massacre(n)

programme.title: The Circus: Inside The Greatest Political Show on Earth
programme.desc: In the Arena. The Democrats make Hillary Clinton a historic nominee; Bernie Sanders diehards jeer and boo in Philadelphia. Also: a look at whether shattering the glass ceiling is enough for Clinton and Kaine to unite their party into a winning coalition(n)

programme.title: Black Snake Moan
programme.desc: In this provocative and affecting character study, Samuel L. Jackson stars as a righteous Tennessee farmer who finds a beaten harlot (Christina Ricci) outside his house and does everything in his power to return her to the path of righteousness and salvation. Ricci is a revelation as the lust-in-the-dust wanton woman with deep-seated psychological problems. Written and directed by Craig Brewer. The film's title comes from the name of a blues standard by Blind Lemon Jefferson(n)

programme.title: Waterworld
programme.desc: A mysterious wanderer looks for dry land after Earth is engulfed by water(n)

programme.title: A.R.C.H.I.E.
programme.desc: A robotic dog goes in search of a family after the lab he belongs to is shut down(n)

programme.title: The Virgin Suicides
programme.desc: Kirsten Dunst (Spiderman) and Josh Hartnett (Black Hawk Down) star in this bittersweet drama, he as the handsome high school jock with brains, she as one of the five Lisbon sisters, all beautiful teenagers. Intertwined with their affair and its sudden ending is the story of how, eventually, all five of the siblings commit suicide, driven by adolescent fears they cannot share while, as a counterpoint, the story is also told from the view of the many boys who admired them from afar. Sofia Coppola (daughter of Francis Ford) captures exactly the angst of growing up in mid-West America in this superbly realised debut film(n)

programme.title: Clouds of Sils Maria
programme.desc: An aging actress returns to the play that made her famous, performing opposite a troubled starlet who is playing her old role. The deeper the veteran actress dives into her new character, the more she learns about her notorious costar(n)

programme.title: The Railway Man
programme.desc: A British soldier who was held as a prisoner of war by the Japanese during World War II confronts the guard who tortured him in order to find closure to that painful chapter of his life(n)

programme.title: No Escape
programme.desc: An American businessman relocates his family to Southeast Asia, but their lives are put in grave danger when they get caught up in a violent political uprising. As they attempt to reach the US embassy, they are aided by a mysterious British tourist(n)

programme.title: Mission: Impossible 2
programme.desc: Special agent Ethan Hunt is plunged into an international crisis. With computer genius Ving Rhames at his side and beautiful thief Thandie Newton on his mind, Hunt races across Australia and Spain on an impossible mission(n)

programme.title: Ray Donovan
programme.desc: Girl With Guitar. Series 4 begins with Ray in recovery mode in the aftermath of the shootout and trying to reconnect with his family and repair his relationship with Bridget(n)

programme.title: Ray Donovan
programme.desc: Marisol. Ray helps Hector handle a person from his past who threatens to reveal a secret that could ruin Hector's boxing career(n)

programme.title: Ray Donovan
programme.sub-title: Little Bill Primm's Big Green Horseshoe
programme.desc: Little Bill Primm's Big Green Horseshoe. An intruder breaks into the Donovan household; Mickey plots a casino heist; Bridget celebrates her 18th birthday and struggles to maintain her independence; Ray visits Belikov in prison to strike a deal; Bunchy and Teresa navigate their marital woes under lockdown(n)

programme.title: Ray Donovan
programme.desc: Federal Boobie Inspector. Ray visits a Hollywood power player in an attempt to get the Russian mob off his back and unearths a secret Ezra shared in the past. Meanwhile, Lena and an ex-girlfriend take Abby out on the town to help her confront fears over a recent health diagnosis; and Mickey offers his boys a job prospect and tries to assimilate back into the family(n)

programme.title: Ray Donovan
programme.desc: Get Even Before Leavin'. With the Russian mob threatening his family, Ray goes on a road trip with Mickey to Primm in hopes of recovering money stolen from a local casino owner. Meanwhile, Terry gains confidence as a trainer and gets renewed interest in the gym; and Bunchy and Bridget take turns looking after baby Maria when Teresa withdraws to her family's house to seek refuge from the pressures of being a new mum(n)

programme.title: Ray Donovan
programme.desc: Fish and Bird. Ray waits to see if Belikov will be released from prison and struggles with the prospect of putting a pimp back out on the street. Later, Art dealer Sonia Kovitsky invites Ray to a breast cancer benefit where he encounters some former clients and becomes more entrenched in her operation. Meanwhile, Teresa spirals into a postpartum depression; and Mickey tries to persuade the DA that he was the sole architect behind the Minassian massacre(n)

programme.title: House of the Dead
programme.desc: Adapted from the popular Sega arcade video game of the same name, director Uwe Boll's action horror effort finds a group of partying teens stranded on an island and doing battle with a new breed of unusually mobile zombies. Looking for a place to party away spring break, college students Cynthia (Sonya Salomaa), Greg (Will Sanderson), and Karma (Enuka Okuma) hear rumors of a rave on a remote island in the Seattle area. Rushing to catch the party boat, the teens pick up friends Simon (Tyron Leitso) and Alicia (Ona Grauer), but discover upon arrival at the dock that the boat has set sail without them. Offering a few dollars to a local captain to hitch a ride to the island, the teens reach their destination only to find it eerily silent with no party in sight. Things go from bad to worse when the group is attacked by a mysterious creature, and they are forced to seek refuge in an old dark house on the island shore. Subsequently running into a few familiar faces and learning to their horror that the rave had been overrun by a horde of terrifying zombies, the group must now make one final bid for survival over the course of a long, blood-soaked night

programme.title: Patrick
programme.desc: A telekinetic coma patient is subjected to cruel medical experiments by a malevolent doctor. When the outwardly brain-dead patient lashes out, a compassionate nurse becomes the target of his supernatural wrath

programme.title: It Follows
programme.desc: In the wake of sleeping with a handsome stranger, a young woman quickly learns that she has inherited a most unusual curse: wherever she goes, lumbering, half-naked phantoms follow, and their singular goal is to see her dead

programme.title: Waterworld
programme.desc: The polar ice caps have melted and the earth is covered by water. The remaining people travel the seas in search of survival. Several different societies exist. The Mariner falls from his customary and solitary existence int having to care for a woman and a young girl while being pursued by the evil forces of the Deacon

programme.title: Lost Christmas
programme.desc: As night falls on Christmas Eve, an enigmatic man named Anthony awakens on the streets of Manchester with no memory of the past, and the unique ability to locate the lost

programme.title: Jessabelle
programme.desc: A woman returns to her childhood home in Louisiana following a debilitating car accident, and explores the mysteries of her past while confronting a malevolent ghost in this terrifying trip into darkness

programme.title: Amigo Undead
programme.desc: A camping trip among friends goes awry when a guys dies and they bury him in cursed soil, which leads to unexpected supernatural events

programme.title: Seventh Moon
programme.desc: A romantic trip to China turns into a lunar nightmare for a pair of happy newlyweds when their taxi driver ditches them in a remote village, and the locals offer them up as sacrifices for the menacing moon creatures that return to Earth annually to replenish their ranks. According to Chinese legend, the dead return to Earth on the seventh month of the lunar year, when the moon glows full in the night sky. America-born Yul (Tim Chiou) and his new wife Melissa (Amy Smart) had just arrived in China to meet Yul's family when their idyllic getaway takes a sudden turn for the worse. When night falls and their tour guide leaves them stranded in a darkened, boarded-up village, Yul and Amy quickly realize that this wasn't a planned stop. Once a year, the lunar creatures return to Earth in search of a sacrifice. Yul and Amy have just been offered up, and now in order to avoid being assimilated into the collective that pursues them through the darkened forest, they will have to survive until the morning light casts the frightful beasts back to the moon for another year

programme.title: The Texas Chainsaw Massacre
programme.desc: The cult 70s horror has a grisly facelift. Five hippies are terrorised by a crazy cop and a maniac who gets a real buzz out of human body parts

programme.title: The Rocketeer
programme.desc: Many people dream of being able to fly, but for young pilot Cliff Secord the dream comes true. He and his mentor Peevy discover a rocket pack that enables whoever straps it on to fly. But he's soon flying into trouble, because other people want the pack too: film star Neville Sinclair is one, and there's also a bunch of Nazis chasing Cliff. So the scene is set for adventure, and the chance for Cliff to become a true American hero

programme.title: Backcountry
programme.desc: A high-powered executive and her boyfriend go on a weekend camping trip in the Canadian wilderness. Unfortunately, the couple get lost during a hike, and end up being hunted by a vicious black bear

programme.title: Amigo Undead
programme.desc: A camping trip among friends goes awry when a guys dies and they bury him in cursed soil, which leads to unexpected supernatural events

programme.title: Cockneys vs Zombies
programme.desc: Two Cockney siblings lead the residents of a nursing home in a bloody war against the undead in this screamingly funny horror comedy

programme.title: Lumberjack Man
programme.desc: In this entertaining horror comedy, a demonic lumberjack terrorizes the staff of a church camp as they prepare for spring break

programme.title: The Abandoned
programme.desc: An adopted girl returns to her homeland of Russia to explore the dilapidated mountain farm she has recently inherited, only to discover that it harbors a deadly secret in the feature debut from Aftermath director Nacho Cerdà. Shortly after the mysterious death of her birth mother, young Marie was adopted and brought to live in the United States. When Marie receives word that she has inherited an isolated farm in her native Russia, she soon sets out to explore the vast estate and peel away the thick gauze obscuring her secret-shrouded past. Confounded by the local's refusal to show her to the "damned" locale and determined not to give up after coming this far, Marie convinces a man to take her there only to discover that he has inexplicably vanished shortly after arrival. As Marie sets out to explore the ominous and expansive property alone, a surprise encounter with a man named Boris, who claims to have been lured to the house under similar circumstances, sets into motion a chilling series of events in which the ghosts of the past -- as well as deceased doppelgangers of both Marie and Boris -- prevent the frightened pair from leaving. In the terrifying hours that follow, both of these tormented lost souls will find that sometimes the past is best left forgotten

programme.title: The Texas Chainsaw Massacre
programme.desc: Music-video director Marcus Nispel makes his feature debut with this slick and imaginative reinterpretation of Tobe Hooper's 1974 horror classic about teens who encounter a family of psychopaths in a remote part of the Lone Star State(n)

programme.title: Da Sweet Blood of Jesus
programme.desc: In Spike Lee's brilliant reworking of the cult classic "Ganja and Hess," a doctor develops a voracious thirst for blood after an art curator gives him a cursed artifact. Later, he falls into a treacherous affair with the curator's alluring wife(n)

programme.title: Wilbur
programme.desc: A thirtysomething London baker (Charlie Weirauch) with a stuttering problem searches for love. Kerry Michaels. Directed by Dago Rodriguez(n)

programme.title: Off-Air
programme.desc: Programming resumes at 060(n)

programme.title: Adios, para siempre
programme.desc: A photographer (Gustavo Sanchez Parra) specializing in crime-scene photos runs into a serious problem. Mayra Serbulo. Written and directed by David Guillermo Barba(n)

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: Neill Blomkamp (District 9, Elysium) expands on his 2003 short film Tetra Val in this futuristic sci-fi saga written in collaboration with screenwriter Terri Tatchell (who previously worked with Blomkamp on the screenplay for District 9), centering on the story of a police robot named Chappie, who develops the ability to think and feel for himself. As people fight back against the mechanized police force, sinister forces seek to capture Chappie for their nefarious purposes(n)

programme.title: Space Warriors
programme.desc: Wannabe spaceman Jimmy Hawkins defies his dad and enters a NASA competition just as the International Space Station gets into trouble. With NASA officials out of options, they turn to the bright young star and his friends to save the astronauts trapped 200 miles above Earth(n)

programme.title: Waterworld
programme.desc: A mysterious wanderer looks for dry land after Earth is engulfed by water(n)

programme.title: Snowpiercer
programme.desc: The Host and Mother director Bong Joon-ho makes his English-language debut with this dystopian sci-fi thriller set in the aftermath of a failed global-warming experiment that ushered in the dawn of a new Ice Age. As a perpetual-motion engine keeps a super-powered locomotive speeding around the planet, the impoverished lower classes occupy the rear cars while the privileged upper classes are pampered in the front. The fragile balance of power between the two begins to shift, however, when an enigmatic message sparks a revolt that cannot be quelled. Luke Evans, Song Kang-ho, Jamie Bell, John Hurt, Tilda Swinton, and Ed Harris star(n)

programme.title: Awaken
programme.desc: A Russian Special Forces soldier must escape from a mysterious island where people are harvested for their organs and continue on her quest to rescue her sister(n)

programme.title: Compound Fracture
programme.desc: A fractured family fights back against the vengeful wraith that's determined to kill them all, and trap their souls for all eternity. Upon learning his aging father's mental health has taken a turn for the worse, Michael Wolffsen (Tyler Mane) packs up the car, and hits the road with his nephew and fiancé in tow. His heavily fortified country home surrounded by acres of land, Michael's father Gary (Muse Watson) has been dabbling in the occult, and his new wife Annabelle is about to walk out on him. Meanwhile, Michael is convinced that his father is suffering from aggressive dementia, and seeks out a facility where he can be treated. Just when it appears that this family has a handle on their problems, however, a malevolent spirit (Derek Mears) appears determined to imprison their souls, and curse them for generations. Now, with their entire bloodline in danger, this family must fight to avoid a fate worse than death(n)

programme.title: Walter
programme.desc: A movie-theater cashier believes he's the son of God, and is accosted by a ghost who claims to dwell in limbo. This forces him to rethink his place in the universe, and soon he believes the ghost can help him understand his fate(n)

programme.desc: Comic drama about a professor suffering from writer's block trying to deal with the pressures of his complex love life and his troubled students' assorted problems. programme.desc: Demi Moore sinks her teeth into dual roles in this romantic fantasy. She plays Marty, a successful but stressed-out New York career woman. programme.desc: A suicidal man (Christian Svensson) whose wife left him and took their child wants to cancel the hit he purchased on himself. Morocco Omari. Directed by Steven Minor(n)

programme.desc: Topic: mutual-fund newsletters. Rick Dupuis is the program host(n)

programme.title: Lost in Translation
programme.desc: A washed-up American actor experiences culture shock while filming a whiskey commercial in Tokyo, but finds solace in his connection with a married 20-something whose successful photographer husband is in the city on an assignment. As the unlikely pair explores Tokyo, they begin to wonder if their sudden friendship might be growing into something more(n)

programme.title: Good Kill
programme.desc: Andrew Niccol's 21st century war drama Good Kill stars Ethan Hawke as Air Force Major Thomas Egan, a talented pilot who spends his days operating a drone over various terrorist threats in the middle east while sitting in a trailer on a base in Las Vegas. Egan hates not being allowed to fly actual planes anymore, and as the CIA begins dictating orders to Egan and his crew, he begins to feel morally disconnected from his job. This leads to more conflict at home with his wife (January Jones), who wishes her husband could focus on their family as much as his military duty. Good Kill screened at the 2014 Toronto International Film Festival(n)

programme.title: Wolves
programme.desc: In this unconventional horror film, a high schooler discovers he's a werewolf after his parents are savagely murdered. He later ends up in a remote mountain town, where he meets others of his kind and fights for the love of a beautiful woman(n)

programme.title: Dreamcatcher
programme.desc: Friends on a camping trip discover that the town they're vacationing in is being plagued in an unusual fashion by parasitic aliens from outer space. Based on Stephen King's best-selling novel

programme.title: Lost in Translation
programme.desc: (2003) Starring Bill Murray, Scarlett Johansson and Giovanni Ribisi. Directed by Sofia Coppola. Everyone wants to be found. Sometimes you have to go halfway around the world to come full circle. A movie star with a sense of emptiness, and a neglected newlywed meet up as strangers in Tokyo, Japan and form an unlikely bond

programme.title: Alec Mapa: Baby Daddy
programme.desc: Stand-up comedy by Alec Mapa about raising an adopted child with his husband

programme.title: Jessabelle
programme.desc: A woman returns to her childhood home in Louisiana following a debilitating car accident, and explores the mysteries of her past while confronting a malevolent ghost in this terrifying trip into darkness

programme.title: Turbulence 2: Fear of Flying
programme.desc: A passenger of a hijacked airliner who happens to be an airplane engineer works to deactivate a chemical weapons bomb after the hijackers kill the pilot and threaten to kill all the passengers on the plane

programme.title: The Last One
programme.desc: A chronicle of the history of the AIDS Memorial Quilt, created to commemorate those who have died from the disease

programme.title: Ray
programme.desc: Oscar-winning drama telling the turbulent life story of blind music genius Ray Charles. Ray's audacity and ground-breaking talent made him a phenomenon on the road and in the studio, but drugs, women and bad memories took a heavy toll on his personal life

programme.title: Match
programme.desc: Emotions run high in this moving drama about an aging Juilliard dance teacher who is confronted by his painful past during an interview with a grad student. Ultimately, the talk could lead to healing or despair for the interviewer's shattered husband

programme.title: Cas & Dylan
programme.desc: Self-proclaimed loner Dr Cas Pepper finds himself on the run with an aspiring young writer who hopes to help Cas overcome the writer's block preventing him from writing a proper suicide note. Along the way, the unlikely pair discover life has more to teach them both

programme.title: The Warrior's Way
programme.desc: Asian samurai Yang (Korean superstar Jang Dong-gun) has a change of heart after slaughtering his enemy's family, and spares a newborn child. On the run from his master, he heads to America, where he finds a beat-down town that is home to freaks, circus performers, an old drunk (Geoffrey Rush), and a knife-thrower (Kate Bosworth). This spunky love interest soon becomes the student, with the wandering warrior passing along his knowledge so that she can enact revenge against scarred scumbag The Colonel (Danny Huston). As the master tracks the sound of the warrior's sword (literally), the samurai makes one final stand with the town to thwart The Colonel and his gang before they burn it all down. Soon enough, cowboys and ninjas meet in a duel to the death -- guns vs. katanas

programme.title: Shaft
programme.desc: A slick, trigger-happy detective flouts the law as he goes on the hunt for a rich murderer whose power and influence could get him off the hook. Crime thriller

Louis Gossett Jr., Tasha Smith, Tracee Ellis Ross, Malinda Williams

programme.title: Ray
programme.desc: Oscar-winning drama telling the turbulent life story of blind music genius Ray Charles. Ray's audacity and ground-breaking talent made him a phenomenon on the road and in the studio, but drugs, women and bad memories took a heavy toll on his personal life

programme.title: It Follows
programme.desc: In the wake of sleeping with a handsome stranger, a young woman quickly learns that she has inherited a most unusual curse: wherever she goes, lumbering, half-naked phantoms follow, and their singular goal is to see her dead

programme.title: Shaft
programme.desc: This action drama puts a new spin on Shaft, one of the key "blaxploitation" films of the 1970s. John Shaft (Samuel L. Jackson), the namesake nephew of the legendary private eye (Richard Roundtree), is a street-smart police detective who with his partner Carmen Velez (Vanessa L. Williams) has been assigned to a racially motivated murder case, in which a black college student was killed in front of a restaurant by Walter Williams Jr. (Christian Bale), the sociopathic son of a New York construction tycoon, who then fled the country rather than face prosecution. Diane Palmieri (Toni Collette), a waitress on a smoke break, saw the murder, but she doesn't want to talk to the police. Two years later, Walter is forced to return to New York, but without Diane's testimony, the city doesn't have much of a case. Soon, Shaft, Walter Junior, and Walter Senior's goons are all looking for Diane, with Junior enlisting the help of Peoples Hernandez (Jeffrey Wright), a small-time drug dealer who will do anything to move into the big leagues. Shaft and Carmen find Diane, but discover that she had a good reason for being on the lam for the past two years. Amidst all this activity, John gets frequent advice from his uncle, with whom he ponders the idea of quitting the force and opening a detective agency. Shaft was directed by John Singleton, from a screenplay by Singleton, Richard Price, and Shane Salerno(n)

programme.title: Richard Pryor: Omit the Logic
programme.desc: A biography of the pioneering comedian Richard Pryor that features interviews with family members who describe his often difficult life as well as sit-downs with modern-day comics who explain the influence Pryor's unique style had on them(n)

programme.title: The Accidental Spy
programme.desc: Jackie Chan kicks up the action and thrills in this espionage adventure. Chan plays nerdy Hong Kong sporting-goods salesman Buck Yuen, who's drawn into a global adventure involving his long-estranged father, spies and a biological weapon. Eric Tsang, Vivian Hsu, Kim Min-jeong(n)

programme.title: The One I Wrote for You (?)
Backcountry
programme.desc: A young couple on a weekend camping trip into the wilderness wage a grueling struggle for survival in this visceral thriller from Canada. Jenn (Missy Peregrym) is a high-powered executive whose cellphone is never out of reach. Determined to salvage their troubled relationship, Jenn's boyfriend Alex (Jeff Roop) takes them to a secluded campsite near a scenic lake where he used to play as a child. After popping their tent, the couple are settling in when lone hiker Brad (Eric Balfour) appears out of nowhere, and joins them for dinner. The fire dimming later that evening, however, Brad departs, leaving Jenn and Alex to prepare for their long hike the following day. Setting out bright and early, the couple make their way ever deeper into the sprawling forest, only realizing they're hopelessly lost once darkness begins to fall. Meanwhile, their nightmare has only just begun, because many dangers dwell in the forest, and they're about to face the worst one imaginable(n)

programme.title: Last Knights
programme.desc: A skilled medieval warrior and his small clan fight back against an oppressive ruler in order to avenge the murder of their master(n)

programme.title: Freedom
programme.desc: In 1856, a slave and his family escape from the plantation they have been forced to call home for two generations. They are guided by the Underground Railway towards Canada, but are pursued by a relentless slave hunter(n)

programme.title: Miami Vice
programme.desc: Crockett and Tubbs, two Miami detectives, try to stop a global drug trade, making their job extremely dangerous work(n)

programme.title: Pulp Fiction
programme.desc: Crime drama by director Quentin Tarantino, whose Oscar-winning screenplay centres on two hit men(n)

programme.title: Saw
programme.desc: The directorial debut from filmmaker James Wan, this psychological thriller comes from the first screenplay by actor Leigh Whannell, who also stars. Whannell plays Adam, one of two men chained up in a mysterious chamber. The other, Dr. Gordon (Cary Elwes), like Adam, has no idea how either of them got there. Neither of them are led to feel optimistic by the man lying between them dead of a self-inflicted gunshot wound. Together, Adam and Dr. Gordon attempt to piece together what has happened to them and who the sadistic madman behind their imprisonment is. Also starring Danny Glover and Monica Potter, Saw premiered at the 2004 Sundance Film Festival(n)

programme.title: Zodiac
programme.desc: The true story behind the murders that many crime scholars believe to be the most perplexing series of unsolved crimes in modern history comes to the screen in chilling detail as Fight Club and Seven director David Fincher steps behind the camera to tell the mysterious tale of the infamous Zodiac killer. A relentless serial killer is stalking the streets of the San Francisco Bay Area, leaving citizens locked into a constant state of panic, and baffled authorities scrambling for clues. Though the killer sadistically mocks the detectives by leaving a series of perplexing ciphers and menacing letters at the crime scenes, the investigation quickly flatlines when none of the evidence yields any solid leads. As two detectives remain steadfast in their devotion to bringing the elusive killer to justice, they soon find that the madman has control not only over their careers, but their very lives as well. Jake Gyllenhaal, Mark Ruffalo, and Robert Downey Jr. star

programme.title: Mercenaries
programme.desc: A team of elite female commandos infiltrate a woman's prison to rescue a kidnapped diplomat

programme.desc: When Mystery, Alaska's little-known, amateur hockey team accepts a challenge to play against the New York Rangers, the entire population of this small town must put their petty differences aside and pull together as their town becomes the center of a nationally televised event

programme.title: Split Decisions
programme.desc: This family drama centers on an Irish brood in which the father and his two sons work as prizefighters. Both the boys are quite talented, but each has chosen a dramatically different means of exploiting their talent

programme.desc: Complex but lighthearted thriller about computers and cryptography, government and espionage, secrets and deception and betrayal

programme.desc: James DeGale vs. Lucian Bute in a super-middleweight bout in Quebec City

programme.title: War
programme.desc: Action stars Jason Statham and Jet Li pack quite a punch in this full-throttle martial-arts epic. Statham is an FBI agent who goes gunning for the long-thought-dead hitman (Li) who took down his partner three years before. But now, the hired killer is in the middle of an Asian gang war involving the Chinese triad and Japanese yakuza, and all is not as it seems. Directed by Philip G. Atwell. John Lone, Devon Aoki, Saul Rubinek, Ryo Ishibashi(n)

programme.title: Pulp Fiction
programme.desc: Crime drama by director Quentin Tarantino, whose Oscar-winning screenplay centres on two hit men(n)

programme.desc: In this captivating documentary, three climbers ascend Mount Meru and endure numerous challenges while attempting to summit the Shark's Fin, a near-vertical point on the mountain(n)

As outlaws, they gain fame for their daring hold-ups of banks, trains, and stagecoaches -- and make sworn enemies of lawmen, who are determined to see them dead(n)

programme.title: Deterrence
programme.desc: Set in the near future, this political thriller centres around nuclear brinksmanship between Iraq and America as Udei Hussein threatens to fire his missiles at key cities. U.S President Walter Emerson must tackle the situation but becomes stranded in a roadside diner after a freak snowstorm and is forced to run operations from there. Also featuring Sean Astin and Timothy Hutton(n)

programme.title: Exists
programme.desc: Prepare to shake with fear as Bigfoot stalks five friends during a camping trip in the East Texas wilderness(n)

programme.title: Black Hawk Down
programme.desc: Brutally authentic war action detailing the covert US mission in Somalia that became a bloodbath. While the troops on the ground struggle to survive an urban siege by thousands of armed militia, the chopper pilots are shot down one by one(n)

programme.title: Frank & Jesse
programme.desc: Rob Lowe and Bill Paxton star as Frank and Jesse James, who, after the defeat of the South in the Civil War and the pointless murder of their younger brother, seek their own brand of justice. As outlaws, they gain fame for their daring hold-ups of banks, trains, and stagecoaches -- and make sworn enemies of lawmen, who are determined to see them dead(n)

programme.title: The Warrior's Way
programme.desc: Asian samurai Yang (Korean superstar Jang Dong-gun) has a change of heart after slaughtering his enemy's family, and spares a newborn child. On the run from his master, he heads to America, where he finds a beat-down town that is home to freaks, circus performers, an old drunk (Geoffrey Rush), and a knife-thrower (Kate Bosworth). This spunky love interest soon becomes the student, with the wandering warrior passing along his knowledge so that she can enact revenge against scarred scumbag The Colonel (Danny Huston). As the master tracks the sound of the warrior's sword (literally), the samurai makes one final stand with the town to thwart The Colonel and his gang before they burn it all down. Soon enough, cowboys and ninjas meet in a duel to the death -- guns vs. katanas(n)

programme.title: Black Snake Moan
programme.desc: In this provocative and affecting character study, Samuel L. Jackson stars as a righteous Tennessee farmer who finds a beaten harlot (Christina Ricci) outside his house and does everything in his power to return her to the path of righteousness and salvation. Ricci is a revelation as the lust-in-the-dust wanton woman with deep-seated psychological problems. Written and directed by Craig Brewer. The film's title comes from the name of a blues standard by Blind Lemon Jefferson(n)

programme.title: Black Hawk Down
programme.desc: Brutally authentic war action detailing the covert US mission in Somalia that became a bloodbath. While the troops on the ground struggle to survive an urban siege by thousands of armed militia, the chopper pilots are shot down one by one(n)

programme.title: The Stanford Prison Experiment
programme.desc: Kyle Patrick Alvarez's drama The Stanford Prison Experiment is based on real events. Dr. Philip Zimbardo (Billy Cruddup) arranges for 24 volunteers to be either guards or inmates a makeshift prison system so that he can observe how their behavior changes. Eventually those playing guards become abusive and dictatorial, while the inmates band together to survive the harsh conditions. What the Stanford professor doesn't expect is that he and the people running the experiment are also being transformed by taking part in it. The Stanford Prison Experiment screened at the 2015 Sundance Film Festival(n)

programme.title: Da Sweet Blood of Jesus
programme.desc: In Spike Lee's brilliant reworking of the cult classic "Ganja and Hess," a doctor develops a voracious thirst for blood after an art curator gives him a cursed artifact. Later, he falls into a treacherous affair with the curator's alluring wife

programme.title: The Best Man

programme.title: Calendar Girls
programme.desc: Chris (Helen Mirren) and Annie (Julie Walters) are two very different women who live in a small village in the Yorkshire Dales. Their friendship is put to the test just when their relationship needs to be stronger than ever. When Annie's husband dies of leukemia, Chris organizes a campaign to raise funds for the local hospital. Her plan is to produce a calendar featuring photographs of the village women performing their traditional tasks. But the proposal has an original twist: the women will pose in the nude. The pictures are known all across the country and the women become famous(n)

programme.title: Woman in Gold
programme.desc: Six decades after WWII, an elderly Jewish woman (Helen Mirren) returns to Vienna in order to reclaim family belongings that were once seized by the Nazis in this poignant drama based on a true story. Chief among those items is the Gustav Klimt painting "The Lady in Gold." With the help of her ambitious young lawyer (Ryan Reynolds), the woman takes her fight all the way from Austria to the U.S. Supreme Court(n)

programme.title: Cinema Paradiso
programme.desc: Director Giuseppe Tornatore's Oscar-winning paean to the silver screen recalls a man's childhood in 1940s Sicily amid the magic of his town's cinema(n)

programme.title: Miles to Go Before I Sleep
programme.desc: The relationships between musicians and their road crews, and their importance, are explored(n)

programme.title: G.B.F.
programme.desc: The first teen to come out of the closet at North Gateway High struggles to balance his newfound popularity with his longtime friendships as the three most popular girls in school all attempt to claim him as their G.B.F. (gay best friend). The moment Tanner (Michael J. Willett) reveals his true sexuality to his classmates he rockets up the social ladder. Suddenly, he's decked out in the latest fashions, and living it up with the in-crowd. Meanwhile, the friends who used to be part of Tanner's inner circle get left out in the cold. Now Tanner will be faced with the most difficult decision of his high school career -- keep riding the popularity train and accept his role as a human fashion accessory, or go back to the people who have always accepted him for who he really is. Megan Mullally, Jonathan Silverman, Rebecca Gayheart, and Natasha Lyonne co-star in a comedy from director Darren Stein(n)

programme.title: Pride
programme.desc: An unlikely friendship is forged between a small community of striking miners in Wales and a team of London-based gay-and-lesbian activists who help fight their cause. With no end to the strike in sight, the urban activists venture into the countryside to deliver their donation in person, and find they have more in common with the people of this struggling community than anyone on either side could have expected(n)

programme.desc: After striking up a friendship with a wealthy widow, small-town mortician Bernie goes to desperate measures when he becomes fed up with her incessant nagging. Black comedy(n)

Claire, the woman who made the accusation, hires Peyton as a nanny, not knowing of their past involvement.
